description:
Diantha`s Gardevoir is Diantha main partner. The two share a close bond and are able to communicate during battles without speaking. It can Mega Evolve into Mega Gardevoir during battle.
While at the Guipna Highlands for a shooting a movie, a thick fog arrived and Diantha got lost in it. Diantha`s Gardevoir apparently came out of the monster ball she left with her manager and came looking for her, leading the way for everyone.
During its exhibition match against Morgan`s Absol, it was quickly able to dodge all the moves and defeat it quite easily.
name: Sirknight (Carne)
